articles.content: Ferraris are typically red. But for the launch of the new 12Cilindripronounced Doh-DEH-chi Chi-LIN-drithe prancing horse brand elected to slather its cars in a stunning, tawny golden-metallic they ca… [+8546 chars]

articles.author: Matt Kim
articles.title: Shigeru Miyamoto: This is the Most ‘Un-Nintendo-Like’ Thing Nintendo Has Ever Made - IGN
articles.description: “We’re sort of doing something that we are not supposed to do," says the legendary game designer.
articles.content: Although many are labeled with the moniker legend, few deserve it more than Shigeru Miyamoto. His influence on video games is perhaps more far reaching than any other individual, and in the 45-plus y… [+7601 chars]
